question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. white parking sign
B. yellow sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The yellow sign is partially obscured by trees and appears smaller in the image, suggesting it is further away than the white parking sign, which is closer to the foreground. However, without a depth map, this judgment is not definitive.
